mapper.select: SELECT room.id AS id, room.room_number AS roomNumber, room.room_type_id AS roomTypeId, roomType.NAME AS roomTypeName, room.room_price AS roomPrice, room.occupancy_status AS occupancyStatus, room.create_time AS createTime FROM zmsk_guest_room room LEFT JOIN zmsk_room_type roomType ON roomType.id = room.room_type_id WHERE room.shop_id = #{shopId} ORDER BY room.create_time DESC
